gran_espresso.title: Gran Espresso
gran_espresso.description: Light and flavorful blend with cocoa and black pepper for an intense experience

planalto.title: Planalto
planalto.description: Brazilian dark roast with rich and velvety body, and hints of fruits and nuts

picollo.title: Picollo
picollo.description: Mild and smooth blend featuring notes of toasted almond and dried cherry

Danche.title: Danche
Danche.description: Ethiopian hand-harvested blend densely packed with vibrant fruit notes

quality.title: Best quality
quality.description: Discover an endless variety of the world’s best artisan coffee from each of our roasters.

benefits.title: Exclusive benefits
benefits.description: Special offers and swag when you subscribe, including 30% off your first shipment.

shipping.title: Free shipping
shipping.description: We cover the cost and coffee is delivered fast. Peak freshness: guaranteed.

first_step.title: Pick your coffee
first_step.description: Select from our evolving range of artisan coffees. Our beans are ethically sourced and we pay fair prices for them. There are new coffees in all profiles every month for you to try out.

second_step.title: Choose the frequency
second_step.description: Customize your order frequency, quantity, even your roast style and grind type. Pause, skip or cancel your subscription with no commitment through our online portal.

third_step.title: Receive and enjoy!
third_step.description: We ship your package within 48 hours, freshly roasted. Sit back and enjoy award-winning world-class coffees curated to provide a distinct tasting experience.

step_one.title: Pick your coffee
step_one.description: Select from our evolving range of artisan coffees. Our beans are ethically sourced and we pay fair prices for them. There are new coffees in all profiles every month for you to try out.

step_two.title: Choose the frequency
step_two.description: Customize your order frequency, quantity, even your roast style and grind type. Pause, skip or cancel your subscription with no commitment through our online portal.

step_three.title: Receive and enjoy!
step_three.description: We ship your package within 48 hours, freshly roasted. Sit back and enjoy award-winning world-class coffees curated to provide a distinct tasting experience.

prefrences.options_title: How do you drink your coffee?

option_one.title: Capsule
option_one.description: Compatible with Nespresso systems and similar brewers

option_two.title: Filter
option_two.description: For pour over or drip methods like Aeropress, Chemex, and V60

option_three.title: Espresso
option_three.description: Dense and finely ground beans for an intense, flavorful experience

option_one.title: Single Origin
option_one.description: Distinct, high quality coffee from a specific family-owned farm

option_two.title: Decaf
option_two.description: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed

option_three.title: Blended
option_three.description: Combination of two or three dark roasted beans of organic coffees

option_one.title: 250g
option_one.description: Perfect for the solo drinker. Yields about 12 delicious cups.

option_two.title: 500g
option_two.description: Perfect option for a couple. Yields about 40 delectable cups.

option_three.title: 1000g
option_three.description: Perfect for offices and events. Yields about 90 delightful cups.

option_one.title: Wholebean
option_one.description: Best choice if you cherish the full sensory experience

option_two.title: Filter
option_two.description: For drip or pour-over coffee methods such as V60 or Aeropress

option_three.title: Cafetiére
option_three.description: Course ground beans specially suited for french press coffee

option_one.title: Every week
option_one.description: $7.20 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.

option_two.title: Every 2 weeks
option_two.description: $9.60 per shipment. Includes free priority shipping.

option_three.title: Every month
option_three.description: $12.00 per shipment. Includes free priority shipping.
